== Inchamudi (627823) ==

Inchamudi is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 365 hectares and harbouring 811 households with total population of 3341 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 1504 and female population is 1837. Scheduled Caste Population is 929 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 627823<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
